history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00530
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR RURAL EMPLOYMENT ASSISTANCE PROGRAM AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Rural Employment Assistance Act
ABSTRACT : Provides temporary employment to head of the family or single adult member of poor families to do unskilled manual work for forty-five (45) days to ninety (90) days.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATOCABE, RODEL M., GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A., CO, CHRISTOPHER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare

3. Savellano (014 2016-08-23)4. Villarica (008 2017-08-08)
